```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

#Read Data
```{r}
diabetes <- read_csv("diabetes_binary_health_indicators_BRFSS2015.csv")

#convert col names to lower case for easy reference
colnames(diabetes) <- tolower(colnames(diabetes))
```

#Create Factors
```{r}
diabetes <- diabetes |>
  mutate(
    diabetes_binary_f = factor(diabetes_binary, c("no diabetes", "diabetes")), 
    highbp_f = factor(highbp, c("no high BP", "high BP")),
    highchol_f = factor(highchol, c("no high cholesterol", "high cholesterol")),
    cholcheck_f = factor(cholcheck, c("no cholesterol check in 5 years", "yes cholesterol check in 5 years")),
    smoker_f = factor(smoker, c("no", "yes")), 
    stroke_f = factor(stroke, c("no", "yes")),
    heartdiseaseorattack_f = factor(heartdiseaseorattack, c("no", "yes")),
    physactivity_f = factor(physactivity, c("no", "yes")),
    fruits_f = factor(fruits, c("no","yes")),
    veggies_f = factor(veggies, c("no", "yes")),
    hvyalcoholconsump_f = factor(hvyalcoholconsump, c("no", "yes")),
    anyhealthcare_f = factor(anyhealthcare, c("no", "yes")),
    nodocbccost_f = factor(nodocbccost, c("no","yes")),
    genhlth_f = factor(genhlth, c("excellent", "very good", "good", "fair", "poor")),
    diffwalk_f  = factor(diffwalk, c("no", "yes")),
    sex_f = factor(sex, c("female", "male")),
    age_f = factor(age, c("18 to 24",
                          "25 to 29", 
                          "30 to 34", 
                          "35 to 39",
                          "40 to 44",
                          "45 to 49",
                          "50 to 54",
                          "55 to 59",
                          "60 to 64",
                          "65 to 69",
                          "70 to 74",
                          "75 to 79", 
                          "80 to high"
                   )),
    education_f = factor(education, c("Never attended school or only kindergarten",
                         "Grades 1 through 8 (Elementary)",
                         "Grades 9 through 11 (Some high school)",
                         "Grade 12 or GED (High school graduate)",
                         "College 1 year to 3 years (Some college or technical school)",
                         "College 4 years or more (College graduate)")
                         ),
    income_f = factor(income, c("< 10k",
                                "< 15k",
                                "< 20k",
                                "< 25k",
                                "< 35k",
                                "< 50k",
                                "< 75k",
                                "75k+"))
  )
```
